comment: Absolutely love the color customization. Fantastic face.
title: Good look and feel

author: Keiron Gulrajani
comment: Slight lag in the flames when scrolling notifications, otherwise cool!
title: Looks cool, if a little blurry

author: Philipp Reichart
comment: Colors could be more vibrant. Sometimes it's hard to tell foreground and background apart on the watch face even though the color pickers show clearly distinctly colors.

author: hey you
comment: But icon will not come up on S5 screen & d/load notice won't say "open now" - am stuck.  Help

reply.author: Mircea Pricop
reply.content: This is indeed a very confusing part of Android Wear. It won't appear as a regular app on your phone, only inside the Android Wear app where you pick a watch face. That's also where you access its settings from. If you want to uninstall, you can do that from your phone's Settings - Apps and you'll find it in the downloaded list as 'Flames'.

title: Downloads but won't  show
